basics.name: Adrien Kohlbecker
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm an entrepreneur and software engineer focusing on backend architecture and software, fluent in Go, Ruby, Javascript.

work.summary: Sharette is a local, instantaneous and multimodal carpooling app, for your everyday commute.
highlights: Developped the whole product and infrastructure from scratch, with help from a team of 1-2 developpers
Designed the routing algorithms powering our itinerary search using Djikstra on a time-dependent graph
Led the technical integration of our API in the mobile apps of the Paris public transport company (RATP)
Front-end application with Angular, TypeScript and Ionic, statically hosted on Amazon S3
Back-end API in Ruby on Rails, with PostgreSQL and Redis as data-stores
Various microservices in Go: routing algorithms, geographical data querying and high-load APIs (20req/s)
Fully automated infrastructure: immutable AMIs, Cloudformation templates with Troposphere, deployment using Docker and Amazon ECS
Self-hosted continuous integration with BuildKite and Docker (migrated from CircleCI)
Internal CLI toolbelt for development automation and credentials management
Logs collection using FluentD with custom plugins, hosted by Loggly
Infrastructure monitoring and alerting with Datadog
Analytics and BI system using Redash and Segment with in-house data storage
General team building and management, company culture and development processes
Oversaw the design and branding of the product and the company

work.summary: Skerou extracts and analyses the purchases you made at a grocery store using a picture of your receipt. Tech stack: Ruby, Rails, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
highlights: Refactored and reorganized our backround processing pipeline using the Ruote workflow manager library. Resulted in a huge improvement in business reliability and traceability, along with a much more readable code. Released two open source gems to be able to control Resque jobs from Ruote: ruote-resque and ruote-synchronize.

Automated and optimized common developer tasks (such as deployments, database migrations…) into a command-line tool. Reduced tediousness and potential for errors dramatically, and paved the way for continuous deployment.
Designed and implemented a duplicated/overlapped receipt detection algorithm, based on textual data and Nilsimsa signature. The signature based approach allowed a fast lookup for fraud detection.
Proof of concept for receipt data extraction using a Parsing Expression Grammar (with parslet). Improved the maintainability and performance of the old “list of regexps” approach dramaticaly.
A/B tested Amazon Mechanical Turk forms, providing better layout and instructions to our workers and improving accuracy dramatically.
Introduced GitHub flow to the team, with code reviews being the most cherished improvement.
Migrated our code base from multiple apps in different repositories to a single app using Rails Engines, paving the way for code reviews and continuous deployment.
Created a unified development environment inside a virtual machine using Vagrant.
Designed and implemented the www.skerou.com website.
Designed and implemented the www.fidmarques.com website and logo.
Minor contributions to the activeadmin and ruote gems.
